events.title: the High Court sides with the New York Times

movie.title: The Post
movie.plot: A cover-up that spanned four U.S. Presidents pushed the country's first female newspaper publisher and a hard-driving editor to join an unprecedented battle between the press and the government.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 111 nominations.

events.title: four turtles and a rat are injected with a mutagen

movie.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
movie.plot: Darkness has settled over New York City as Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April O'Neil and her cameraman Vern Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredder's diabolical plan.
